name: animation-magnetic-button
description: Button that magnetically attracts toward the cursor when hovering nearby. Uses spring physics for natural-feeling attraction and release.
postMessage:
Import and use:

import { MagneticButton } from './components/animation-magnetic-button/MagneticButton';

<MagneticButton strength={0.4} radius={150}>
  Get Started
</MagneticButton>
